products.name: Caffè Americano
products.description: Espresso shots topped with hot water create a light layer of crema culminating in this wonderfully rich cup with depth and nuance.

products.name: Featured Medium Roast - Pike Place® Roast
products.description: From our first store in Seattle’s Pike Place Market to our coffeehouses around the world, customers requested a freshly brewed coffee they could enjoy throughout the day. In 2008 our master blenders and roasters created this for you—a smooth, well-rounded blend of Latin American coffees with subtly rich flavors of chocolate and toasted nuts, it’s served fresh every day at a Starbucks store near you.

products.name: Decaf Pike Place® Roast
products.description: From our first store in Seattle’s Pike Place Market to our coffeehouses around the world, customers requested a freshly brewed coffee they could enjoy throughout the day. In 2008 our master blenders and roasters created this for you—a smooth, well-rounded blend of Latin American coffees with subtly rich flavors of chocolate and toasted nuts, it’s served fresh every day at a Starbucks store near you. (Decaf as you like it.)

products.name: Caffè Misto
products.description: A one-to-one combination of fresh-brewed coffee and steamed milk add up to one distinctly delicious coffee drink remarkably mixed.

products.name: Featured Dark Roast
products.description: This full-bodied dark roast coffee has the bold, robust flavors to showcase our roasting and blending artistry.

products.name: Cappuccino
products.description: Dark, rich espresso lies in wait under a smoothed and stretched layer of thick milk foam. An alchemy of barista artistry and craft.

products.name: Espresso
products.description: Our smooth signature Espresso Roast with rich flavor and caramelly sweetness is at the very heart of everything we do.

products.name: Espresso Con Panna
products.description: Espresso meets a dollop of whipped cream to enhance the rich and caramelly flavors of a straight-up shot.

products.name: Flat White
products.description: Smooth ristretto shots of espresso get the perfect amount of steamed whole milk to create a not-too-strong, not-too-creamy, just-right flavor.

products.name: Honey Almondmilk Flat White
products.description:
This flat white intentionally pairs almondmilk and Starbucks Blonde Espresso Roast with a hint of honey, making a perfect amount of creamy, nutty sweetness.

If Starbucks Blonde Espresso Roast is not available, Signature Espresso Roast will be substituted.
products.ingredients: ALMONDMILK [FILTERED WATER, ALMONDS, SUGAR, CALCIUM CARBONATE, SUNFLOWER LECITHIN, SEA SALT, XANTHAN GUM, GUAR GUM, VITAMIN A PALMITATE, VITAMIN D2 (ERGOCALCIFEROL)], BREWED ESPRESSO, HONEY BLEND [HONEY, WATER, NATURAL FLAVORS, POTASSIUM SORBATE, XANTHAN GUM, CITRIC ACID]

products.name: Caramel Brulée Latte
products.description: Our signature espresso, steamed milk and rich caramel brulée sauce finished with whipped cream and a supreme topping of even more caramel brulée bits.
products.ingredients: ALMONDMILK [FILTERED WATER, ALMONDS, SUGAR, CALCIUM CARBONATE, SUNFLOWER LECITHIN, SEA SALT, XANTHAN GUM, GUAR GUM, VITAMIN A PALMITATE, VITAMIN D2 (ERGOCALCIFEROL)], BREWED ESPRESSO, HONEY BLEND [HONEY, WATER, NATURAL FLAVORS, POTASSIUM SORBATE, XANTHAN GUM, CITRIC ACID]

products.name: Peppermint Mocha
products.description: Our festive, all-star Peppermint Mocha brightens the holidays: signature Espresso Roast combines with steamed milk, sweet mocha sauce and peppermint-flavored syrup, topped with whipped cream and dark-chocolate curls.
products.ingredients: MILK, MOCHA SAUCE [WATER, SUGAR, COCOA PROCESSED WITH ALKALI, NATURAL FLAVOR], BREWED ESPRESSO, PEPPERMINT SYRUP [SUGAR, WATER, NATURAL FLAVOR, SODIUM BENZOATE, CITRIC ACID], WHIPPED CREAM [CREAM (CREAM, MONO AND DIGLYCERIDES, CARAGEENAN), VANILLA SYRUP (SUGAR, WATER, NATURAL FLAVORS, POTASSIUM SORBATE, CITRIC ACID)], DARK CHOCOLATE CURLS [SUGAR, CHOCOLATE MASS (PROCESSED WITH ALKALI), COCOA BUTTER, SOY LECITHIN, VANILLA EXTRACT, MILK]

products.name: Coffee Traveler - Veranda Blend®
products.description: A convenient carrier filled with 96 fl oz of our brewed Starbucks Blonde Veranda Blend (equivalent to 12 8-fl-oz cups), perfect for meetings, picnic gatherings or any occasion that calls for coffee.

Fluffy, cage-free egg frittata with kale, basil pesto and mozzarella on a toasted Cheddar and onion bun. An herbaceous twist on a classic egg and cheese sandwich.

-HIGH-PROTEIN
-VEGETARIAN
